com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager

Class PersistenceUnitConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scottescue.dropwizard.entitymanager.PersistenceUnitConfig

  • public abstract class PersistenceUnitConfig
extends Object
    Provides a means to configure PersistenceUnit options.
